title: Elementalist Lux Prestige Border
body: The border you get from buying the skin is bearly seen. It has a color similar to the background and he summoner name covers the buttom part. Is it intended to stay that way?

replies.body: Can you [screenshot what you're seeing](https://gyazo.com/) so I can confirm?
i am having the same problem. It seems my ranked border is taking priority (http://i.imgur.com/BUPN4bz.jpg)

Thanks for sending that screenshot. This is how the border is intended to look, since the border is much like the PROJECT:Disruption borders, which only go around the champion splash rather than the entire frame. I'd imagine this is to prevent border from overlapping or conflicting entirely.

Let me know if  you have any questions.

What's the point of the silly border if the giant "elementalist lux" name tag + my mastery banner + diamond border is just going to remove it anyways? I legit want to know.

The mastery banner + ranked border doesn't really remove it, though. The border is for the champion splash specifically, so it works around those elements, as outlined below. I've marked the border's elements in red boxes:

(Click to enlarge)

I hope that clarifies how this border is intended to work. If you have any other questions, please let me know.

How does it not?

I lose the entire outer edge just for being ranked.

I lose half of the entire special snowflake just so you can tell me that I'm playing  Lux. 

I lose 3/4ths  of the corner designs from mastery banner + being told I'm Lux.

And I lose almost the entire top from my ranked border.

So again, how does it "not really remove it." When I'm only seeing about 1/8th of the banner just because I play ranked? That's not fair to us in the slightest.  

It's the exact same problem with the Project line up.

"Pay an extra absurd amount of money and you get to see 1/4th of the special snowflake border you paid for because your ranked banner + our overly huge name display covers it all up! It's totally worth it we swear at Rito Games!"

Take the black stuff entirely out of the inside. 

Take the mastery banner and make it so the champion has animations in the loading screen. 

Or, they can make the mastery banner create a design that encircles around your user name.

This opens up like 60% of the missing border. While additionally making the loading screen cooler. Which I thought Rito games was all about. But what Rito games is actually all about these days is cutting corners and putting 10% into everything while charging a 100% mark up compared to everyone else because Rito Games is like that x3.
If you receive it as a gift, do you still get the boarder? And if you received it a while back, but didn't get on till past Dec. 13, do you still get the boarder?

Yes, if you get gifted *Elementalist Lux* you still get the loading border, but not if you get it *after* the 13th. 

Check out our FAQ for Elementalist Lux [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948) for more info. Let me know if you have any other questions.

So, a friend had given me the skin.(Yay!). But, I clearly don't have wifi at my house. Does that mean I will have the boarder, even if I receive it AFTER Dec.13? I didn't bu the skin so it was a gift. Do I still acquire it even from receiving it?
